PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FlowFittingDuctFitting
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Duct fitting occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcFlowFitting.

PropertyDef.Name: AbsoluteRoughnessFactor
PropertyDef.Definition: The absolute roughness factor of the duct fitting.

PropertyDef.Name: HasLiner
PropertyDef.Definition: TRUE if the fitting has interior duct insulating lining, FALSE if it does not.

PropertyDef.Name: Color
PropertyDef.Definition:
The color of the duct fitting.
Note: This is typically used for any duct fittings with a painted surface which is not otherwise specified as a covering.
